## Project Description

The goal of the project is to analyse the characteristics of faecal sludge received at the treatment plant from different sources for the month of april

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
read_csv(here::here("data/raw/influent-data-2025.csv"))
```
